channel.title: Quest Tab Font/Size
channel.description: I have added the text I wanted to my quest tab but I don't like the size of the font as it is too big. How can I make it smaller? Here are the pics of the stuff that I want changed. I will upload them for you all. The first one is the stuff I want to change and the next one is the font size that I want for my server.

item.title: Quest Tab Font/Size
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Google how to change the font size in java for a selected section, or something like that. Sorry for assuming you haven’t already.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Tab Font/Size
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Thanks for your help but it still doesn’t solve the font size problem.
The quest tab title is changed but it is not centered.

Read full topic

item.title: Quest Tab Font/Size
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

For delta look in clickingmost.java (for the response or the actual click) or in texthandler.java for the text
For PI try rsinterface.java

Or try going into Client.java
search for public void process() {

or if that dosent work use the search bar or go http://w ww.ru ne lo cus.c om/forums/showthread.php?29277-PI-Quest-Tab-Tutorial

Read full topic
